name: Simple Tune Up
description: An auxer will come to your vehicle to check its engine condition. The mechanic will also replace the oil, spark plugs, fuel filter, air filter, and anything else that is needed. If the vehicle needs more maintenance, it will be taken to the mechanic’s shop.

name: Auto Body
description: An auxer will come to your vehicle to remove damaged body parts, hammer out and patch dents and other minor body damage. A cost estimate for further repairs will be provided.

name: Jump
description: An auxermwill come to your vehicle to remove damaged body parts, hammer out and patch dents and other minor body damage. A cost estimate for further repairs will be provided.

name: Tow
description: If you get stranded somewhere or need your vehicle moved from one place to another, a tow truck will come to your aid.

name: Flat
description: Tires flat? We’ll have someone bring them back to life.

name: Housecleaning
description: House dirty? Anything you need cleaned will be by one of our auxers.

name: Organization
description: If you lack order in your life, we got you. We’ll organize your space!

name: Rake Leaves
description: Fall tends to “leave” a mess all over the place (get it). Don’t worry about having to rake that up, an auxer will take care of that.

name: Planting
description: Thumbs aren’t green? No worries, we got some.

name: Mow lawn
description: As fun as mowing a lawn may be, you’re too busy for that right now. Have an auxer come and take some of that fun away from you.

name: Snow Removal
description: Sit back and drink some hot coco while someone else shovels up all that snow.

name: House Moving
description: Order anything you’re craving. If we could find it, we’ll get it to you… Just be realistic.

name: Dorm Moving
description: Order anything you want. If we could find it, we’ll get it to you… Just be realistic.

name: Hanging
description: From portraits to televisions, if it’s hangable, we’ll hang it.

name: Plumbing
description: Unclog your drains with one of our Auxers.

name: Electrical
description: If it requires electricity, we could fix it. Or add it. Or whatever you need.

name: Gutter Cleaning
description: You do not want to climb up a 100-foot latter to clean you gutters. Trust me, it’s a lot of work.

name: Grooming
description: No home should have hair everywhere. Is this a problem for you? Let us groom your pet.

name: Walk
description: Got no time to walk your hamster… I mean dog… We do!

name: IT Support
description: Any assistance needed with mobile phones, televisions, computers, software products or other informatic, electronic or mechanical goods? Not a problem.

name: Barber
description: You need a haircut. Don’t leave your home. We’ll have someone come to you.

name: Hair Stylist
description: You need your hair done. Don’t leave your home. We’ll have someone come to you.
